item.title: Things to do post format with a dual partition Mac OSx #reformatted-my-mac
item.description: So I had to do, what I had to do! and reformatted my Mac and now - I’m getting up in running again.

item.title: Time for a service - #reformated-my-mac-day
item.description: Reformatting a computer is usually an emotionally distressful activity - involving losing files, trying to find software discs and panic about lost licence codes.

item.title: I feel like a kid in a candy shop - #reformatted-my-mac-day
item.description: I woke up this morning .. it’s pouring with rain - my Apple MacBook Pro decides it doesn’t want to connect to my wifi.
